en.description:
I am a Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in all stages of web development, from initial design and architecture to deployment and maintenance. I have a strong background in developing, testing, and debugging both frontend and backend applications, ensuring seamless integration and performance.

I bring a diverse and versatile skill set, proficient in technologies such as TypeScript, SASS, ReactJS, Angular, Node.js, C# (.Net) and Java (SpringBoot). I am adept at self-managing during independent projects and excel in collaborative team environments.

professionalExperiences.name: End-to-End Web Development
descriptions: Skilled in developing and maintaining complex web portals and internal applications, implementing new features, and optimizing existing functionalities for various clients, including CENOSA, Do it Center, ILP, CEMPRO, MQA Americas, and Feduro.

professionalExperiences.name: Backend Services and API Development
descriptions: Experience in creating and configuring RESTful APIs and web services for data exchange between systems, integrating third-party services, and ensuring secure and efficient data handling.

professionalExperiences.name: Infrastructure and Server Management
descriptions: Proficient in configuring servers (IIS, Linux, Windows Server) and deploying applications in development and production environments. Skilled in optimizing infrastructure to ensure reliable application performance.

professionalExperiences.name: Process Automation and Workflow Optimization
descriptions: Expertise in automating business processes, creating digital signature flows, and developing specialized modules for improving user experience and operational efficiency.

professionalExperiences.name: Cross-Functional Collaboration
descriptions: Strong communicator with experience in coordinating with multidisciplinary teams, participating in project planning, and conducting comprehensive testing to deliver high-quality solutions.

professionalExperiences.name: Technical Documentation and Training
descriptions: Capable of creating detailed technical documentation, user manuals, and guides. Experienced in training end-users and support teams on new tools and applications.

professionalExperiences.name: Project Estimation and Planning
descriptions: Involved in project estimation and planning for new web portals, rebuilding services, and developing new modules, contributing to strategic decision-making and resource allocation.

keySkills.name: key Skills
skills: Advanced proficiency in TypeScript, SASS, ReactJS, Angular, Node.js, C# (.Net), Java (SpringBoot).
Strong debugging and testing skills to ensure robust code and functionality.
Ability to lead projects independently and work effectively in a team environment.
